metadata.description: Create new or use an existing Log Analytic Workspace
Specify the Azure Region for your new or existing OMS workspace
Use an existing Automation account or create a new
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account

SolutionName.defaultValue: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0

generateHpeLogAnalyticsLogs.name: GenerateHpeLogAnalyticsLogs
generateHpeLogAnalyticsLogs.description: This runbook drives the generatation of log records via the Hybrid Runbook Worker.

scheduleHpeLogAnalyticsLogGeneration.name: ScheduleHpeLogAnalyticsLogGeneration
scheduleHpeLogAnalyticsLogGeneration.description: This runbook is used to schedule GenerateHpeLogAnalyticsLogs to run periodically.

customSolution.name: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0
customSolution.displayName: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0
customSolution.description: Monitor HPE OneView managed assets in a hybrid IT environment.
customSolution.author: Hewlett Packard Enterprise

customSolution.name: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0 - Azure Stack Hub
customSolution.displayName: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0 - Azure Stack Hub
customSolution.description: Monitor HPE Azure Stack Hub in a hybrid IT environment.
customSolution.author: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
customSolution.savedSearchCategory: HPE OneView for Log Analytics - Azure Stack Hub

customSolution.name: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0 - Server Hardware
customSolution.displayName: HPE OneView for Log Analytics v1.4.0 - Server Hardware
customSolution.description: Monitor HPE OneView managed assets in a hybrid IT environment.
customSolution.author: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
customSolution.savedSearchCategory: HPE OneView for Log Analytics - Server Hardware Components

savedQueryArray.query: union HPEOneView*_v1_CL| where status_s != "OK" and Type != "HPEOneView_Alerts_v1_CL" and Type != "HPEOneView_OneViewAppliance_v1_CL" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by uri_s
union HPEOneView*_v1_CL | project Type | distinct Type
savedQueryArray.displayName: All Log Record Types Generated by the Solution

savedQueryArray.query: union HPEOneView*_v1_CL | project Type,TimeGenerated | where Type contains "HPEOneView" | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Type
savedQueryArray.displayName: Last TimeGenerated for each Log Record Type

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_OneViewAppliance_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*), Status=any(overallApplianceStatus_s) by applianceName_s | where overallApplianceStatus_s != "OK"
HPEOneView_ServerHardware_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uuid_g | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Hardware with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_ServerHardware_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uuid_g | where powerState_s =='Off'
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Hardware that is powered off

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_ServerProfiles_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Server profiles with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_Interconnects_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
HPEOneView_LogicalInterconnects_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Logical Interconnects with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_SASInterconnects_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
HPEOneView_StorageSystems_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Storage Systems with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StorageSystems_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | project TotalCapacity=todecimal(totalCapacity_s), FreeCapacity=todecimal(freeCapacity_s), AllocatedCapacity=todecimal(allocatedCapacity_s)|project AllocatedCapacity , TotalCapacity, PercentAllocated=round(((AllocatedCapacity/TotalCapacity)*100),2)| where (PercentAllocated > 90)
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Storage Systems where 90 percent of total capacity is used

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StoragePools_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Storage pools with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StoragePools_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | project TotalCapacity=todecimal(totalCapacity_s), FreeCapacity=todecimal(freeCapacity_s), AllocatedCapacity=todecimal(allocatedCapacity_s)|project AllocatedCapacity , TotalCapacity, PercentAllocated=round(((AllocatedCapacity/TotalCapacity)*100),2)| where (PercentAllocated > 90)
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Storage pools where 90 percent of total capacity is used

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StorageVolumes_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedQueryArray.displayName: All the Storage Volumes with Issues

savedQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StorageVolumes_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where isShareable_b == "TRUE"
HPEOneView_DriveEnclosures_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
HPEOneView_Enclosures_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"

savedAzureStackQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_AzureStackHub_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*), Status=any(AzureStackHubOverallHardwareStatus_s) by AzureStackApplianceName_s | where AzureStackHubOverallHardwareStatus_s != "OK"
savedAzureStackQueryArray.displayName: All the Azure Stack Hub with Issues

savedAzureStackQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_ServerHardware_v1_CL | where partOfAzureStackInstance_s == true | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uuid_g | where status_s != "OK"
savedAzureStackQueryArray.displayName: All the Azure Stack Nodes with Issues

savedAzureStackQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_ServerHardware_v1_CL | where partOfAzureStackInstance_s == true | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uuid_g | where powerState_s =='Off'
savedAzureStackQueryArray.displayName: All the Azure Stack Nodes that is powered off

savedAzureStackQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_ServerProfiles_v1_CL | where partOfAzureStackInstance_s == true | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by uri_s | where status_s != "OK"
savedAzureStackQueryArray.displayName: All the Azure Stack Node Server profiles with Issues

savedServerComponentQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_StorageModule_v1_CL | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber_s | where Status_Health_s != "OK"
savedServerComponentQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Storage with Issues

savedServerComponentQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_MemoryModule_v1_CL| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by MemoryGuid_s| where Status_Health_s != "OK"
savedServerComponentQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Memory with Issues

savedServerComponentQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_PhysicalDrive_v1_CL| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber_s| where Status_Health_s != "OK"
savedServerComponentQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Storage PhysicalDrives with Issues

savedServerComponentQueryArray.query: HPEOneView_LogicalDrive_v1_CL| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by VolumeUniqueIdentifier_g| where Status_Health_s != "OK"
savedServerComponentQueryArray.displayName: All the Server Storage LogicalDrives with Issues

savedServerComponentQueryArray.query: let ServerName = [** Server Name **];let HPEOVServerHardware = HPEOneView_ServerHardware_v1_CL | where Computer == ServerName| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by serialNumber_s | project Status=status_s,ComputerName=Computer, Type;let HPEOVStorageModule = HPEOneView_StorageModule_v1_CL| where ServerName_s == ServerName | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber_s | project Status=Status_Health_s,Location=Location_s, Type;let HPEOVMemoryModule = HPEOneView_MemoryModule_v1_CL | where ServerName_s == ServerName | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by MemoryGuid_s | project Location=DeviceLocator_s,Status=Status_Health_s,Type;let HPEOVStorageModulePhysicalDrive = HPEOneView_PhysicalDrive_v1_CL | where ServerName_s == ServerName  | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber_s | project Location=Location_s,Status=Status_Health_s,Type,VolumeID=LogicalDriveUniqueID_g;let HPEOVStorageModuleLogicalDrive = HPEOneView_LogicalDrive_v1_CL | where ServerName_s == ServerName  | summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by VolumeUniqueIdentifier_g | project VolumeID=VolumeUniqueIdentifier_g,Status=Status_Health_s,Type;union HPEOVServerHardware, HPEOVStorageModule, HPEOVMemoryModule, HPEOVStorageModulePhysicalDrive, HPEOVStorageModuleLogicalDrive
savedServerComponentQueryArray.displayName: All the Server hardware with sub-components

Header.Label: HPE OneView for Microsoft Azure Log Analytics (v1.4.0)

List.Title: Hybrid IT Management
List.Content: Provides a bridge between Microsoft cloud management services and HPE hardware infrastructure.

List.Title: Manage on-premises HPE infrastructure
List.Content: Data is automatically collected from HPE OneView and HPE Synergy to bring visibility of HPE infrastructure hardware, inventory, health and status, and long term event correlation and trend analysis.

List.Title: Provide feedback
List.Content: To provide feedback on this solution, please contact ov4alafeedback@hpe.com. This email should not be used for technical support. Documentation can be found at www.hpe.com/info/ov4la-docs.

Donut.Query: let EmptyTable = datatable (applianceName_s:string,overallApplianceStatus_s:string)[];union isfuzzy=true EmptyTable,HPEOneView_OneViewAppliance_v1_CL | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by applianceName_s | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(applianceName_s) by overallApplianceStatus_s | sort by AggregatedValue desc

List.Query: let EmptyTable = datatable (applianceLaunchURL_s:string, applianceName_s:string,overallApplianceStatus_s:string)[];union isfuzzy=true EmptyTable,HPEOneView_OneViewAppliance_v1_CL | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by applianceName_s | project applianceName_s, overallApplianceStatus_s, applianceLaunchURL_s
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: let EmptyTable = datatable (applianceName_s:string)[];let lastTimeGenerated = toscalar (union isfuzzy=true EmptyTable,HPEOneView_Alerts_v1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by applianceName_s | summarize makeset(TimeGenerated) | project set_TimeGenerated);union isfuzzy=true EmptyTable,HPEOneView_Alerts_v1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) | where TimeGenerated in (lastTimeGenerated) | count
